docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Lakshmi Subramanian

I’m an AI/ML engineer who loves turning wild ideas into real AI that actually works.

I build things that think, see, and sometimes even move. Case in point: this page… built with a bit of AI mischief.

docs.title: What I Do
docs.text:
• Bring complex concepts to life with AI that works in the real world.
  • Build systems spanning ML, computer vision, robotics, and data engineering.
  • Picked up a few patents and shared some publications.
  • Love making models fast smart, and actually useful.
  • This page? Yep… AI helped me put it together. UX/full-stack, not my forte 😅.

Read My Resume

Say Hi! 👋

docs.title: WORK EXPERIENCE
docs.text:
Senior R&D Engineer

Panasonic R&D Centre, Singapore Sept 2021 – Oct 2025

  • RAG for Patent Application: Built a RAG system to query 150k+ technical documents for supporting innovation proposal development.
  • LLM for Robotic Manipulation: Developed and validated LLM-based methods for real-world robotic manipulation tasks.
  • Student Engagement Estimation: Designed a real-time engagement estimator using facial tracking and time-series models.
  • AliProducts Challenge: Created an efficient CLIP/BLIP-2-based image-text retrieval system with optimized preprocessing and inference.
  • Thermal Comfort Prediction: Built an end-to-end system using pose estimation, action recognition, and ML models for thermal comfort estimation.
  • Vision Transformer Compression: Achieved 61.4% inference time reduction with <1% accuracy drop using pruning and distillation on transformer models.
  • Surveillance Human Detection: Fine-tuned YOLOX to improve performance on distorted images from fisheye surveillance cameras.
  • Inventor on 4 granted patents in the areas of thermal comfort optimization and robotic manipulation systems.
Research Engineer Intern

A*STAR, Singapore Feb 2021 – May 2021

  • Deepfake Detection Analysis: Evaluated deepfake creation and detection, analyzing the impact of global features, face cutouts, and video/image augmentation techniques on detection accuracy.
Software Analyst

Aspire Systems, India Jul 2017 - May 2020

  • ETL & Data Warehousing: Built Talend and SQL-based ETL pipelines for Snowflake and Hive, enabling incremental loads, error logging, and email alerts; automated workflows using TAC and Spark.
  • Big Data & Visualization: Developed PySpark jobs for HDFS/HBase processing and Hive–MySQL integration; created Power BI dashboards to support analytics for manufacturing and research clients.

docs.title: RESEARCH YOU CAN ACCESS
docs.text:
• ViReSkill: Vision-Grounded Replanning with Skill Memory for LLM-Based Planning in Lifelong Robot Learning
  • Memory Transfer Planning: LLM-driven Context-Aware Code Adaptation for Robot Manipulation
  • EnvBridge: Bridging Diverse Environments with Cross-Environment Knowledge Transfer for Embodied AI

National University of Singapore, Singapore Jul 2020 – Jun 2021
